api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sport1.p.rapidapi.comhttps://docs.rapidapi.com/docs/keys?a236f20115msh22fb5936ab91947p1f8113jsn65f273848924"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sport1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
